tasks.task_description: Verify the Codebase/data folder contains the required dataset files
Update kernel-metadata.json to reference the correct notebook
Push the simplified notebook to Kaggle
Verify the dataset is uploaded to Kaggle
Test the notebook setup on Kaggle

description: Setup Kaggle training for D2E2S with codebase containing dataset
context: Verified Codebase/data contains all required datasets: 14lap, 14res, 15res, 16res with train/dev/test files
Updated kernel-metadata.json to reference D2E2S_Simple_Training.ipynb with GPU enabled and d2e2s-codebase dataset
Successfully pushed simplified notebook to Kaggle (version 4). URL: https://www.kaggle.com/code/uom239364u/d2e2s-training
Verified dataset exists on Kaggle: uom239364u/d2e2s-codebase (6.4MB, updated 2025-11-21)
Manual testing required on Kaggle. User needs to: 1) Open notebook URL, 2) Verify dataset is added, 3) Enable GPU, 4) Run All cells
